name: crudibase
description: A user-friendly web application for exploring Wikibase knowledge graphs
author: Michael A. Wright

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=src/backend && npm install --workspace=src/frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=src/backend && npm run build --workspace=src/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=src/backend && npm run test --workspace=src/frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=src/backend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=src/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=src/backend && npm run lint --workspace=src/frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=src/backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=src/frontend
